title: Was Plato a real living human or a metaphorical figure? - Quora

response.answer_text: The original question was: “Was Socrates a real living human or a metaphorical figure?” There is overwhelming evidence that Socrates was an actual person in ancient Athens during the fourth century BC. For example, there are three well-known historical references to him and his life: a comedy written by the Aristophanes, a detailed account in the writings of Plato, and also a biographical sketch by Xenophon. And, that’s only a few from his lifetime. There are numerous other accounts by ancient historians who wrote shortly after his lifetime.

It’s not clear. Wikipedia, at least at one time, considered the possibility that he was “a modeling compound used by young children for arts and crafts projects at home. It is composed of flour, water, salt, borax, and mineral oil.” Plato vs. Play-Doh
